Title: Burst tyre, speed contributed to Anthony Joshua’s accident – Investigators
Summary: Anthony Joshua's car had burst tyre before hitting a stationary truck, investigators say . The former world heavyweight champion survived the accident in which he survived . The British boxer was in a stable condition when he was injured .

Title: Adamawa govt cancels crossover night activities over security concerns
Summary: Adamawa State Government has cancelled all activities scheduled for the 2025 Crossover Night celebrations at the Unity Flyover in Jimeta, Yola, citing security concerns . The cancellation affects events planned for the night of December 31, 2025, through the early early morning .

Title: Good news for livestock farmers as vet hospital project begins in Taraba
Summary: Livestock farmers in Taraba State have expressed excitement following the handover of a parcel of land for the construction of a modern veterinary hospital in Jalingo, the state capital . The handover ceremony took place on Tuesday at the project project .

Title: Rivers lawmakers return ₦100,000 gifts from Fubara
Summary: Members of the 10th Rivers State House of Assembly returned ₦100,000 each . They described the gifts as unsolicited and unapproved transfers . They said they were on the instruction of the Executive Governor of Rivers State, Siminalayi Fubara .

Title: Detty December Fest 2025 ends with star-studded performances in Lagos
Summary: Detty December Fest 2025 wrapped up in Lagos with performances from international and African music stars . The month-long festival, held at Ilubirin, Lagos, ran from December 7 to 29 .

Title: First 10 countries to ring in New Year 2026
Summary: The only real difference is timing: the exact moment each country steps into 2026 . The feeling of celebration and hope cuts across borders, cultures, languages and beliefs .

Title: Amorim says ‘really confident’ about Man Utd potential despite Wolves draw
Summary: Ruben Amorim still optimistic about Man Utd's prospects despite 1-1 draw at home to Wolves . The Portuguese says he is ‘really confident’ about United’s potential this season .

Title: Heirs Energies acquires Maurel & Prom’s 20% stake in Seplat Energy for $500m
Summary: Heirs Energies acquires Maurel & Prom’s 20% stake in Seplat Energy for $500m . The acquisition represents a further milestone in the company's long-term strategy .

Title: Just in: Nigeria’s oil output drops 5.9% to 1.599m bpd
Summary: Nigeria's oil output drops 5.9% to 1.599m bpd . The Nigerian Upstream Petroleum Regulatory Commission (NUPRC) disclosed this in its December 2025 Crude Oil and Condensate Production report .

Title: Adamawa govt. cancels ‘cross-over night’ activities at Unity Fly-Over
Summary: Adamawa government has announced cancellation of December 31 ‘Cross Over Night’ activities at Unity Fly-Over in Jimeta, Yola . Adamawa govt. cancels December 31 activities in the interest of safety and security of residents .

Title: 24-year-old nurse seeks N18m for brain surgery
Summary: A 24-year-old graduate, Blessing Enegho, who is battling a severe brain condition, is seeking financial assistance . The financial appeal was contained in a document sent to The PUNCH on Wednesday by her church, the Catholic Church of Transfiguration, Laity, Arepo, Ogun State .

Title: Insecurity: Adamawa cancels crossover night event at Jimeta flyover
Summary: Adamawa State Government has announced the cancellation of the December 31 “Cross Over Night” activities scheduled to hold at the Unity Flyover in Jimeta, Yola, the state capital . Chief Press Secretary to Governor Ahmadu Fintiri, Humwashi Wonosikou, disclosed this in a statement issued on Wednesday .

Title: Asake to headline Spotify African heat playlist for 2026
Summary: Spotify says Afrobeats superstar, Asake, will curate its ‘African Heat Playlist’ for an exclusive New Year’s Eve takeover as the world ushers in 2026 . Spotify says the collaboration would feature Asake's chart-topping songs alongside defining sounds from across the African continent .

Title: No automatic bank deductions under new tax laws – Oyedele
Summary: The assurance was given during Channels Television’s end-of-year programme, 2025 In Retrospect: Charting a Pathway to 2026 . Chairman of the Presidential Committee on Fiscal Policy and Tax Reforms, Taiwo Oyedele, has assured Nigerians that the new tax laws will not involve automatic deductions from personal

Title: One dead, five trapped as rice mill collapses in Kebbi
Summary: Rescue efforts ongoing at collapsed rice mill in Birnin Kebbi on Tuesday evening . One worker has been confirmed dead, while five others are trapped . Rescue operations are still ongoing at the time of filing this report . The cause of the collapse has yet to be determined .
